trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified pointer points to the memory block in the internal library heap

seg-source.mrk: Determines whether the specified pointer points to the memory block in the internal library heap

target.mrk: Determines whether the specified pointer points to the memory block in the internal library heap

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the memory block that to be tested.

seg-source.mrk: A pointer to the memory block that to be tested.

target.mrk: A pointer to the memory block that to be tested.

trans-unit.source: the specified pointer is a valid memory pointer.

seg-source.mrk: the specified pointer is a valid memory pointer.

target.mrk: the specified pointer is a valid memory pointer.

trans-unit.source: the specified pointer is not a valid memory pointer.

seg-source.mrk: the specified pointer is not a valid memory pointer.

target.mrk: the specified pointer is not a valid memory pointer.

trans-unit.source: The _WinAPI_IsMemory() function accepts only the pointers returned by some _WinAPI_* functions (see description),

seg-source.mrk: The _WinAPI_IsMemory() function accepts only the pointers returned by some _WinAPI_* functions (see description),

target.mrk: The _WinAPI_IsMemory() function accepts only the pointers returned by some _WinAPI_* functions (see description),
